channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mass killings in 2025 in the US hit the lowest level since 2006
item.description: Seventeen mass killings have occurred this year in the U.S., the lowest since 2006

item.title: Michael and Susan Dell donate $6.25B to encourage families to claim 'Trump Accounts'
item.description: Billionaires Michael and Susan Dell pledged a historic $6.25 billion on Tuesday to provide an incentive to families to adopt new investment accounts f...

item.title: Man to serve 40 years for killing University of Mississippi student Jay Lee
item.description: A man who pleaded guilty to the killing of a University of Mississippi graduate student was sentenced to 50 years with 10 years suspended on Tuesday

item.title: Eugene Hasenfus, key figure in 1980s Iran-Contra affair, dies at 84

item.title: Despite legal challenge, Florida college votes again to transfer land for Trump presidential library
item.description: The board of the South Florida college that’s giving away a valuable piece of property for Donald Trump’s future presidential library redid its vote t...
